name: Let's Clean This Place Up: EcoJam1
name_original: Let's Clean This Place Up: EcoJam1
description:
This is my first game jam project, so even though I didn't get as much worked in as I'd liked, the amount I learned made every moment worth it!  (For example, the WebGL version isn't handling animations or controls the way it did when I tested it in the editor, so still more to learn.)

The downloadable PC/Mac/Linux build has a couple of tweaks from the WebGL version submitted for the game jam, mainly that you can quit the game with a button.
